articles.title: Osun gov-elect, Davido, others bag Afro awards - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The Osun State Governor-Elect, Senator Ademola Adeleke, his nephew and singer David Adeleke, popularly known as Davido and legendary African drummer, Chief Tajudeen Amoo-Adeleke, are among Africans and Americans to be honoured at the Afro Award 2022 in Los An…
articles.content:
This was contained in a statement issued by Founder and Executive Producer of  Afro Awards, Mr. Taiwo Oduala,.
Also to be honoured is the First Lady of Sierra Leone, Mrs. Fatima Maada, Founder and C… [+1900 chars]

articles.author: Emma Kinery
articles.title: Biden blames extreme MAGA Republicans for intimidating voters and election officials, calling it 'corrosive' to democracy - CNBC
articles.description: President Joe Biden urged Americans to reject election-denying candidates and be patient with results ahead of the first national Election Day held since the Jan. 6 attack.
articles.content: President Joe Biden urged Americans to vote in favor of democracy, reject election-denying candidates and be patient with results ahead of the first national Election Day held since the Jan. 6 attack… [+2619 chars]
